DynamicSpikingCbSynapse Class Reference

#include <dynamicspikingcbsynapse.h>

Inheritance diagram for DynamicSpikingCbSynapse:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A dynamic spiking synapse (see Markram et al, 1998).

The conductance of the synapse is increased by when a presynaptic spike hits the synapse and decays exponentially (time constant ) otherwise. and model the current state of facilitation and depression.

Public Member Functions

  • virtual int advance (void)
    Advance the state of the Synapse.
  • virtual int addOutgoing (Advancable *a)
    Outgoing objects must be CbNeurons.

Public Attributes

  • double E
    Equilibrium potential given by the Nernst equation.

Private Attributes

  • double * GSummationPoint
    Pointer to postsynaptic conductance summation point within the synaptic target ( Neuron, SynapticChannel, Compartment...).
